title: Bella Hadid shows off an array of emotions in leggy black mini-dress while lounging at home
text:
Bella Hadid got in touch with her Dutch heritage when she did a shoot for Vogue Netherlands at the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam earlier this week.

Now back home in New York City, The 23-year-old model took to Instagram on Saturday with a series of photos of herself casually lounging, presumably at her Manhattan digs.

In the snaps, she exhibited three very different emotions while decked out in a stylish leggy black long-sleeve mini-dress.

Inquisitive: Bella Hadid shared a series of photos of herself exhibiting three different emotions while lounging in New York City on Saturday

In one photo, Hadid flashed an inquisitive look to the left while sitting on a table full of flowers with her feet stretched out onto a couch in front of her.

Her gams were nearly on full display with the exception of her black sheer knee-highs that were matched with a pair of chunky black leather ankle-boots.

In a second snap, Hadid showed off a big beaming smile, that was a borderline laugh, while still sitting on the table.

Beaming: The model flashed a big smile in her black long-sleeve mini-dress

In this one she had her legs closer together and her left hand preserving her modesty.

Her 26.4 million followers also get a better look at her shoulder-length dark tresses by leaning her head down, every so slightly.

The third and final image portrayed her cheeky, comedic side as she leaned leaning back on a yellow couch with a snarly look on her face and her legs kicked out off to the side.

Comedic: Hadid, 23, got cheeky on the final image where she flashed a snarly look on her face and her legs stretched out across a yellow couch

Three days earlier, while on that shoot in Amsterdam, Hadid shared a selfie from her photo-shoot at the Rijksmuseum as she was standing inside a tent with green foliage in the background.

In it she wore a lacy black bra top with her black tresses styled into a bun on top, with braids cascading down.

She commented how it was 'beyond memorable' to be part of the Dutch art issue and that she was 'so proud to be a Dutchie.'

Her mother, model Yolanda Hadid, was born and raised in Papendrecht, Netherlands.
description: Bella Hadid shows off an array of emotions decked on out in leggy black mini-dress while lounging at home in New York City on Saturday.
